mapper.insert: insert into ResellBoards (member_id, resellBoard_title, resellBoard_content, resellBoard_price, resellBoard_addr,resellBoard_img1, resellBoard_img2, resellBoard_img3, resellBoard_img4) values (#{member_id},#{resellBoard_title}, #{resellBoard_content},#{resellBoard_price}, #{resellBoard_addr},#{resellBoard_img1}, #{resellBoard_img2},#{resellBoard_img3}, #{resellBoard_img4} );
